experiences: Developed Customer UI: Designed and implemented the customer-facing user interface using React.js, ensuring a seamless and responsive experience across various devices.

Database Management: Utilized MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval, implementing schema design, CRUD operations, and data indexing for optimal performance.
API Integration: Created RESTful APIs to handle customer orders, user authentication, and menu management, ensuring secure and efficient data transactions.
Authentication and Authorization: Implemented JWT-based authentication for secure user login and access control, protecting sensitive user data and application endpoints.
